column1: Project Eno: List of actions that amplify a sense of prsence / here-now, build better thought bridges between the consciousness and unconsciousness
Think about death. Feel the urgency.
Look at an object. Focus on its edges. Then view it holistically.
Work on something with intense focus. Then take deep rest.
Think of one new thing you are grateful for.
Take an object. Close your eyes. Feel the object and reconstruct its form as accurately as possible.
Listen to a song and focus on it without doing anything else.
